body.p: The project source tree is stored in The Sourceforge.net SVN Repository.
Read-only access to the source tree is available via the repository URL: https://svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/cilib
The source tree is organised using the traditional branches, tags and trunk directories (the latest code is available in the trunk directory).

Only the CILib commiter's (with SVN update access) are allowed to updated the source tree. Any patches should be forwarded to the commiter's to include. New patches and code will only be committed, once they are approved but the committer and the addition is regarded as a valid contribution.
